about-me.name: About
about-me.presentation: HelloðŸ‘‹ I am 24 years old, and I am a full-stack JavaScript developer. After obtaining my degree in electronic and computer systems, I chose to specialize in web development. I now have nearly two years of experience as a full-stack JavaScript developer!

overcraft.name: Overcraft
overcraft.description: Overcraft is a platform where StarCraft 2 players can create, organize, and share their build orders to better learn and optimize their strategies. It offers an interactive mode with a timer to execute builds in real-time, as well as customization and editing options.

web-cv.name: Web CV
web-cv.description: My Web CV is a modern and interactive application developed with Next.js, offering smooth navigation and an optimized experience through a polished interface and dark mode. It is designed to present my career in a professional and dynamic way. ðŸš€

universite-cote-d-azur-ulysseus.name: UniversitÃ© CÃ´te d'Azur - Ulysseus
universite-cote-d-azur-ulysseus.description: Development of applications for the Ulysseus alliance of institutions. The main technologies used are JavaScript, Python, Linux, and Docker.

match-4-cooperation.name: Match4Cooperation
match-4-cooperation.description: Ulysseus Match4Cooperation aims to bring together the research community of the Ulysseus European University. It enables researchers within the Ulysseus network to share their work, collaborate on European project calls, and find mobility opportunities.

invenio-rdm.name: Invenio RDM
invenio-rdm.description: InvenioRDM is an open-source platform developed by CERN for managing and sharing research data, offering advanced features for data deposit, search, and preservation.

airflow.name: AirFlow
airflow.description: Development of an automated monitoring system (PINGER) using AirFlow to check the availability of our web applications and track the validity of SSL certificates across our domains.

student-portal.name: Student Portal
student-portal.description: Development of a centralized student portal to display events and activities organized across different campuses, thus facilitating access to information and student participation.

microsoft-azure.name: Microsoft - Azure
microsoft-azure.description: Automation of the process for adding new users to the Ulysseus tenant via a Python script, thus facilitating access management and user integration.

servers-details.name: Servers Details
servers-details.description: Automation of the retrieval of detailed server information, including performance, status, and configuration data, then generating an Excel report for easy tracking and quick analysis.

licence.name: Bachelor's in Embedded Systems
licence.description: Programming languages: C / C++ and VHDL (PIC16, ARDUINO, STM32). Real-time OS with FreeRTOS. Linux and Windows operating systems.

bts.name: BTS in Digital Systems
bts.description: Study of schematics, design, and troubleshooting on electronic boards, signal analysis, Arduino programming, HTML/CSS.
